caption: Amazing probably be better if I could eat in
Definitely MUST try ... DELICIOUS!!!!!
Amazing burgers and fries
Ghost burger is part of Espita. Look inside for both restaurants' menus.
My wife and I have found our new burger place. Fantastic!
All it took was a single UberEATS order which had included the 👻🍔 to end up completely smitten with the patties they serve
Needed a little more salt, not bad.

Ghostburger is a pop-up restaurant inside Espita near the Convention Center in Northwest D.C. It's very much the product of the pandemic. When you walk inside the front doors of Espita, you'll see a small sign by one of the murals by the bar that reads "Ghostburger pick up." It's here you grab your burgers and fries.  My house ordered burgers on a Friday night for pick-up. It only took 25 minutes from placing the online order to picking it up. Service was fast and friendly.  The burgers themselves were small, but good. I ordered "The Frenchie" with a double patty and it was full of flavor. My crinkle cut fries on the side were a big portion. Each person in our house ordered one and we could have easily gotten away with just two for all four of us.  Overall, Ghostburger was a good experience.
Great burger.  Only wish it was bigger
Had the La Hamburgesa - good stuff
Delicious burger
The burgers are definitely delicious, they’re just much smaller than I’d expect them to be, especially for the price.

Ghostburger is one of the very few places I visited more than once during my quarantine takeout explorations. I just sometimes really crave their Philly cheesesteak! I'm kind of craving it right now!  I have also had their La Hamburguesa which is spicy, juicy, and wonderfully filling!  I hope they stay in the area permanently as right now they are listed as a pop up within Espita.
Now that’s a tasty burger! Philly fries were great also, looking forward to trying the rest of the menu.
Delicious tasting burger, but lettuce would have made it better

I prefer a more even meat:toppings ratio on my burger, so instead of getting one double patty burger, I got two single patty burgers: one Ghostburger and one LA HAMBURGUESA. I preferred the Ghost to the LaHam but felt both were deserving of a solid "B+" rating. The fries were a solid "B" as well.  If you want a better burger, I'd suggest Melange at 4th and K NW. They also have great fries, both solid "A" ratings. Melange has the best burger in Shaw.  My #2 favorite burger and fries in Shaw are at Dacha. Dacha's burger has two patties, cheese, bacon, LTO, and peanut butter for a very unique experience. The ambiance at Dacha is also second-to-none. Sehr gemütlich.  So, after these two, I'd rate Ghostburger a solid #3 as a burger joint in Shaw.(Sorry Capital Burger but you're for the tourist crowd.) Incidentally, my wife ordered the lentil salad and a taco from the co-located "mother" restaurant, Espita. Her meal was far tastier and healthier than mine, but when you crave a burger...
Highly recommend!  The double ghost burger was delicious and filling. Loved the crinkles fries with the aioli on the side.  Takeout was quick and easy, and the food traveled well!

Went there with my wife and we started with the ghostburger, the way it comes, (I added bacon). Excellent burger, though not huge, not too much. If I wanted more, I would order the double, which I now know I could finish and still walk home. Fries were really good too. I highly recommend this place. I will definately make sure I go back again.

I’ve been to some of the best 🧀 🥩 🥖 places in Philly and Ghostburger might have dethroned them all. It’s REAL good, the “whiz” is a white cheddar sauce and cheesus Christ it was on point. The roll is soft but not soggy and the steak was melt in your mouth tender. Tried the Burger a week later and I can’t stop salivating when I think about it. The patties are thicker than a typical smash burger but it’s a very manageable size and the bun was 🤩 I got them both delivered and they both held their integrity well. The fries were kind of soggy but Im sure they’d be better at the location.

Get the double patties.  This is all you need to know.  Yeah it's expensive, but I got the single as I wasn't hungry and I messed up.  The burger was excellent and so I wish I had 100% more of it in my belly.  I got the Ghostburger and it was great. Would totally get it again. With, you know, two patties.

Absolutely, 5 out of 5 stars! Ordered via delivery and, to my surprise, the burger held it's form and wasn't soggy (like most burger deliveries I receive). This makes me love Ghostburger even more! Outside of delivery, the burger was awesome.   The pickles were super crisp and the burger satisfied every burger craving I had leading up to my order! I also ordered the wedge salad and it was really good. The lettuce was crisp and the bacon crispy (even though it had a transit time).  The tomatoes were obviously very fresh and the blue cheese that they use is really tasty.  Overall, I will be strictly ordering my burgers from Ghostburger.  DELICIOUS and writing this review makes me want to order from them right now...IT IS after 4 pm when they start making burgers...seriously thinking about it!!  ENJOY - 100% craveworthy!

So I saw the article online and some pictures and decided to try it out as I LOVE Espita and was also interested in why they would be doing Burgers and Cheesesteaks.  I had the Ghost burger with Carnitas(Holy ****) They are great. It’s just opening this week and with most business/restaurants will tweak something things for the better! There isn’t much to change here.  Also tried the americano spritz(Adult Root beer) smells sweet but finishes nice and dry. Drinking this beverage made me want to try the Philly Cheesesteak.  I will be Ordering this again10/10. And btw have you seen the pictures of the burgers it’s basically art. What a wonderful thing to come from such trying times in the restaurant industry .
Best burgers and cheese steaks.  Better than the original Philly cheese steak..
